kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://ergast.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://ergast.com/api/f1/2008/circuits.json path_url=/api/f1/2008/circuits.json headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.
